    • Method Detail

      • onAttach

        public void onAttach(CarouselLayoutManager layoutManager)
        Description copied from interface: CarouselView.ViewTransformer
        Called when attaching the transformer to a CarouselLayoutManager. Allowing to set behaviours of CarouselLayoutManager, e.g. drawOrder.
        Specified by:
        onAttach in interface CarouselView.ViewTransformer
        See Also:
        CarouselLayoutManager#setDrawOrder(DrawOrder), CarouselLayoutManager#setScroller(Scroller)

      • transform

        public void transform(android.view.View view,
                      float position)
        Description copied from interface: CarouselView.ViewTransformer
        Transform a given item view based on position. Usually translate, rotation, alpha, visibility, ... may be altered.
        Specified by:
        transform in interface CarouselView.ViewTransformer
        Parameters:
        view - Item view
        position - For example, 0 for the current center-most item at a stable position; 4 for 4-th item at the right to the current item; -3 for 3-rd item at the left to the current item; 0.1 for the current item with 10% offset right to its stable position.
